description: This file defines an Angular service called EventBusService that facilitates lightweight cross-component communication through a global search stream. It encapsulates a BehaviorSubject to manage search query updates and exposes an observable for other components to subscribe to.

classes.name: EventBusService
classes.description: An Angular injectable service providing a global event bus primarily for search term broadcasting between components.

methods.name: search$
methods.description: Getter that returns an observable stream of the current search query.

methods.name: setSearch
methods.description: Method to update the current search query, which notifies all subscribers.
